description:
Long portages are not to be feared. The PRO Dry Pack is made with super-tough coated polyester, with burly nylon bottom to handle sitting on the ground. A fully-supportive and adjustable harness system, similar to what you'd find on a backpack, allows you to carry heavy loads over long distances, and the shoulder and waist straps are removable for travel or use as a dry sack.

  • Made of rugged polyester, polyurethane-coated on both sides with welded seams for lasting waterproofness. PVC-free
  • Bottom and lower sides are thick polyurethane-coated nylon for added durability
  • DrySeal™ roll closure is highly water-resistant (though not waterproof through indefinite submersion)
  • Side compression straps secure roll-top and keep contents compact
  • Padded shoulder straps can be adjusted to fit a variety of torso lengths
  • Full-length frame and padded lumbar and waistbelt improve support when carrying heavy loads
  • Shoulder straps and waistbelt are removable for travel
  • Lash points to stow it securely
name: SealLine PRO Dry Pack 70L
